page.title: 15MID-SUSSEX EMPLOYMENT (4)
page.content: {Farming:}In{Scaynes Hill}there is a market garden owned by Mr.Cox.He owns 70 acres and grows:- blackberries,blackcurrants,redcurrants raspberries,gooseberries,greengages, rhubarb,apples,pears and plums.He also produces a few cherries,apricots and peaches.He only has 1 greenhouse for personal use and is thinking of getting more.He uses fishbone blood fertiliser and spends Â£50/year on it, and also buys Â£400 worth of weed killer/year.Mr & Mrs Cox employ no one.As they only have 1 month in a season when the fruit is ripe,they let people pick their own and send some to shops.They have large orders from the {Glyndebourne}music festival every year.For the rest of the year they prune,weed and fertilize their land.The Cox's do not make a profit as fruit is cheap.
